nutrition: Eat balanced diet with fruits, vegetables, whole grains
Limit processed foods, sugar, and saturated fats
Stay hydrated with water throughout day
Maintain healthy weight through diet and exercise
exercise: 150 minutes moderate exercise or 75 minutes vigorous exercise weekly
Include strength training 2 days per week
Stay active throughout day with walking and movement
sleep: 7-9 hours quality sleep per night for adults
Create dark, quiet, cool sleep environment
stress_management: Seek professional help for persistent stress

preventive_screenings.blood_pressure: At least every 2 years for adults over 18
preventive_screenings.cholesterol: Every 4-6 years for adults, more often if risk factors
preventive_screenings.diabetes: Every 3 years for adults over 45, or if overweight with risk factors
cancer_screenings: Colon cancer: Regular screening from age 45
Breast cancer: Mammograms every 1-2 years from age 40-50
Cervical cancer: Pap test every 3 years from age 21
Prostate cancer: Discuss with doctor from age 50
